deprecated_notify.title: The Netgear LTE notify service is changing
deprecated_notify.description:
The Netgear LTE notify service was previously set up via YAML configuration.

This created a service for a specified recipient without having to include the phone number.

Please adjust any automations or scripts you may have to use the `{name}` service and include target for specifying a recipient.

delete_sms.name: Delete SMS
delete_sms.description: Deletes messages from the modem inbox.

host.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::host%]
host.description: The modem that should have a message deleted.

sms_id.name: SMS ID
sms_id.description: Integer or list of integers with inbox IDs of messages to delete.

host.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::host%]
host.description: The modem to set options on.

connect_lte.name: Connect LTE
connect_lte.description: Asks the modem to establish the LTE connection.

disconnect_lte.name: Disconnect LTE
disconnect_lte.description: Asks the modem to close the LTE connection.
